UpdateWarning.message:
Hi! Thanks for using CrossUp! 

Version 0.4.2.0 includes some changes
under the hood to the way the plugin
settings are saved. Your previous settings
SHOULD™ have carried over, but you might
need to make some adjustments.

HotbarN.description: Should match the term used in  (Character Configuration > Hotbar Settings > Display)

CrossHotbarMenuTerm.description: {0} is the set number, {1} is 'Left' or 'Right'. Should match the exact term used in the dropdown menus in [Character Configuration > Hotbar Settings > Custom].

ExpandedHoldControls.description: Term used in base game settings [Character Configuration > Hotbar Settings > Custom]

WXHB.description: Term used in base game settings [Character Configuration > Hotbar Settings > Custom]

DoubleTap.description: Phrase used in base game settings [Character Configuration > Hotbar Settings > Custom]

BarSeparation.description: Refers to the plugin feature that lets the user split up the left/right halves of the Cross Hotbar.

SeparateLR.description: Separate is a verb in this context

CenterNote.message: This will override your HUD setting for the bar's horizontal position.
CenterNote.description: Help icon in the Plugin UI [CrossUp Settings > Look & Feel > Cross Hotbar Layout]

SetNumText.description: Refers to the text on the Cross Hotbar that indicates the selected set number.

ChangeSetDisplay.description: Refers to the display for switching sets that appears when the R1/RB button is held

HideTriggerText.description: Refers to the L2/R2 or LT/RT text displayed on the Cross Hotbar

HideUnassignedSlots.description: Should match the in-game config setting [Character Configuration > Hotbar Settings > Display]

BlendDodge.description: Blends the selected color in a way that brightens the result. TBH I don't even know why it's called this in English.

ButtonGlow.description: The glowing frame that appears around a pressed/hovered hotbar button

ButtonPulse.description: The pulse animation that appears on a pressed/clicked hotbar button

SeparateExHold.description: Separate is an adjective in this context

BarPosition.description: Text used if only one Expanded Hold bar is shown

BarPositionSpecific.description: Text used if two Expanded Hold bars are shown ('L→R Bar Position' and 'R→L Bar Position')

SepExWarning.message: NOTE: This feature functions by borrowing the buttons from two of your standard mouse/keyboard hotbars. The hotbars you choose will not be overwritten, but they will be unavailable while the feature is active.
SepExWarning.description: Warning for the Separate Expanded Hold feature. It's the weirdest thing the plugin does so it's important for this to be clear.

HudAllSame.message: Apply the same settings to all HUD Slots

HudUnique.message: Apply different settings to each HUD Slot

HighlightMsg.message: Settings that are|highlighted|will change with your HUD.
HighlightMsg.description: The text inside the | delimiters will be highlighted with a different color in the plugin window.

AutoSwitch.description: Activates the feature to change the sets on the extra bars depending on which Set the main bar is using. Value {0} is the type of hotbar receiving custom assignments (either 'Expanded Hold Controls' or 'EXHB')

IfUsing.description: Left column header in the Bar Assignment table. Forms the sentence 'If using [main set number], map [bar type] to [bar set]'. The window layout makes the grammatical order pretty inflexible, but you can just change this to the equivalent of 'Set #'.

MapTo.description: Middle and right column headers in the Bar Assignment table. Forms the sentence 'If using [main set number], map [bar type] to [bar set]'. The window layout makes the grammatical order pretty inflexible, but you can just change this to the equivalent of '{0} Mapping'.

DalamudDesc.message:
This plugin provides customizations for the look and feel of the Cross Hotbar

-Split up the left/right hotbars
Display Expanded Hold Controls Separately
-Customize colors and element positions
-Greater control over which sets your extra bars are mapped to
